member.name: T:MARC.Everest.Formatters.XML.Datatypes.R1.Formatter
member.summary: A linked class to that exists to retain backwards compatibility with pre 1.0 versions of Everest

member.name: T:MARC.Everest.Formatters.XML.Datatypes.R1.CanadianDatatypeFormatter
member.summary: Represents a data type formatter that already has the compatibility mode set to Canadian
member.remarks: Setting compatibility to Canadian will have several effects on the formatting of data types. This includes the emitting of a specializationType attribute (in place of Flavor)

member.name: M:MARC.Everest.Formatters.XML.Datatypes.R1.CanadianDatatypeFormatter.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the Canadian datatype formatter

member.name: T:MARC.Everest.Formatters.XML.Datatypes.R1.ClinicalDocumentDatatypeFormatter
member.summary: Represents a data type formatter that is set to emulate Data Types used with CDAr2
member.remarks: Using this formatter will set the compatibility of the formatter to ClinicalDocumentArchitecture which means that some features of data types will not be represented on the wire.

member.name: M:MARC.Everest.Formatters.XML.Datatypes.R1.ClinicalDocumentDatatypeFormatter.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the CDA datatype formatter

member.name: T:MARC.Everest.Formatters.XML.Datatypes.R1.DatatypeFormatter
member.summary: Represents a formatter that can be used as a graph aide for the purpose of formatting data types instances to the XML Datatypes R1 specification.
